com.ibm.streamsx.topology.spi.operators

Class Primitive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.streams.operator.AbstractOperator
      • com.ibm.streamsx.topology.internal.functional.ops.FunctionFunctor
        • com.ibm.streamsx.topology.internal.functional.ops.AbstractPrimitive
          • com.ibm.streamsx.topology.spi.operators.Primitive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ibm.streams.operator.Operator, com.ibm.streamsx.topology.internal.functional.ops.Functional, FunctionalOperator, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @SharedLoader
public abstract class Primitive
extends com.ibm.streamsx.topology.internal.functional.ops.AbstractPrimitive
implements FunctionalOperator
    A functional operator. This is part of the SPI to allow additional functional style functionality to built using the primitives provided by this toolkit. Only methods explicitly declared in this class are part of the API. Use of super-class methods (except those defined by java.lang.Object) is not recommended and such methods may change or be removed at any time.
